Class UserStorage

Object
UserStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
Storage<User>
public class UserStorage extends Object implements Storage<User>
Handles the storage and retrieval of user data from text files.

This class loads users from role-specific files and provides methods to save user data persistently. It supports Applicants, Officers, and Managers.

      public UserStorage(String applicantsFilepath, String officersFilepath, String managersFilepath)
      Constructs a UserStorage instance with specified file paths.
      Parameters:
      applicantsFilepath - The file path for storing applicant data.
      officersFilepath - The file path for storing officer data.
      managersFilepath - The file path for storing manager data.

    • loadAll

      public List<User> loadAll()
      Loads all users from the respective files.
      Specified by:
      loadAll in interface Storage<User>
      Returns:
      A map of users keyed by NRIC.

    • loadUsersFromFile

      private void loadUsersFromFile(List<User> users, String filename, UserRole role)
      Reads user data from the specified file and adds them to the provided map.
      Parameters:
      users - The map where loaded users will be stored.
      filename - The file from which users will be loaded.
      role - The role of the users being loaded (Applicant, Officer, or Manager).

    • saveAll

      public void saveAll(List<User> users)
      Saves all users to their respective files.
      Specified by:
      saveAll in interface Storage<User>
      Parameters:
      users - The map of users to be saved, keyed by NRIC.

      Saves users to the specified file based on their role.
      Parameters:
      users - The map of users to be saved.
      filename - The file where the user data should be stored.
